root.name: Trails in the Sky: Second Chapter
root.description: OverviewThe Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki SC (Second Chapter) is the second entry of the Trails in the Sky trilogy in Falcom's Legend of Heroes RPG series. The game takes place directly after the events of The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky and was originally released on the PC on March 9, 2006. Ports of the Second Chapter were later released for the PlayStation Portable in 2007 and the PlayStation 3 in 2013, which featured HD graphics. XSEED has announced that they will be publishing the PC and PSP versions of the Second Chapter in North America with a planned 2014 release. Carpe Fulgur, the company responsible for localizing Recettear, was contracted to translate Sora no Kiseki SC's massive script.
